events.message: I requested a refund for my recent order as the item did not arrive, and I have not received any updates regarding the return process.
The reported issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on keywords referencing refund and return.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to this refund case to assist the customer with the return and refund process.
Hello! I’m Maria from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request and ensure we resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if you have already initiated a return or received any shipping labels?
My order number is 78451239. I haven’t received any labels yet and haven’t started the return process because I was waiting for your instructions.
Thank you for the info. I have now sent you a prepaid return shipping label via email. Once we receive the item back, we will process your refund within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and for providing the return label. I’ll send the item today and appreciate your help resolving this.
We have confirmed receipt of your returned item and processed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow a few days for the transaction to reflect.
Just checking in to make sure you have received your refund and that everything else is satisfactory with your experience.
We appreciate you contacting support. Your refund case is now closed. Please reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
We’ve sent a short survey to understand your satisfaction level regarding this refund case. Your feedback helps us improve.
